sourcesContent:
<template>
  <n-space vertical>
    <n-steps :current="Number(current)" :status="currentStatus">
      <n-step
        title="营销目标"
        description="All through the day, I me mine I me mine, I me mine"
      >
      
      </n-step>
      <n-step
        title="客户画像"
        description="When I find myself in times of trouble Mother Mary comes to me"
      />
      <n-step
        title="产品描述"
        description="Here come old flat top He come grooving up slowly"
      />
      <n-step
        title="场景&情绪"
        description="Something in the way she moves Attracts me like no other lover"
      />
    </n-steps>
    <n-space>
      <n-button-group>
        <n-button @click="prev">
          <template #icon>
            <n-icon>
              <md-arrow-round-back />
            </n-icon>
          </template>
        </n-button>
        <n-button @click="next">
          <template #icon>
            <n-icon>
              <md-arrow-round-forward />
            </n-icon>
          </template>
        </n-button>
      </n-button-group>
      <n-radio-group v-model:value="currentStatus" size="medium" name="basic">
        <n-radio-button value="error">
          Error
        </n-radio-button>
        <n-radio-button value="process">
          Process
        </n-radio-button>
        <n-radio-button value="wait">
          Wait
        </n-radio-button>
        <n-radio-button value="finish">
          Finish
        </n-radio-button>
      </n-radio-group>
  </n-space>
</n-space>

<n-card>
<create-campaign-form/>
</n-card>

</template>

<script setup>
import {ref} from 'vue';
import { MdArrowRoundBack, MdArrowRoundForward } from '@vicons/ionicons4';
import { NIcon, NStep, NSpace, NButton, NRadioGroup, NRadioButton,NSteps} from 'naive-ui';
import CreateCampaignForm from './CreateCampaignForm.vue';
import CreatePersonaForm from './CreatePersonaForm.vue';
import CreateProductForm from './CreateProductForm.vue';

const currentRef = ref(1);
const currentStatus = ref('process');
const current = currentRef;
const next = () => {
  console.log(currentRef.value);
  if (currentRef.value === null)
    currentRef.value = 1;
  else if (currentRef.value >= 4)
    currentRef.value = null;
  else
    currentRef.value++;
 console.log(currentRef.value);
}

const prev = () => {
  console.log(currentRef.value);
  if (currentRef.value === 0)
    currentRef.value = null;
  else if (currentRef.value === null)
    currentRef.value = 4;
  else
    currentRef.value--;
  console.log(currentRef.value);
}

</script>
